鼟鼟鼟

鼟字的基本解释

鼟
tēng
〔鼟鼟〕鼓声，如“梦听鼓鼟鼟。”

鼟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tēng］
［《廣韻》他登切，平登，透。］
象声词。形容鼓声。参见“鼟鼟”。

鼟字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【鼓字部】　鼟； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页1527第09
【廣韻】【集韻】?他登切，音磴。【玉篇】鼓聲。　又【集韻】都騰切，音登。又徒登切，音騰。義?同。

鼟字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鼟字的起名意思

暂无。

Fly
Basic explanation of words
Fly
tēng
〔鼟鼟] Drumming, such as "Dream to listen to the drum 鼟鼟."
Fly
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tēng］
["Guangyun" he went on cutting, flat on, and through. ]
Onomatopoeia. Describe the drum sound. See "鼟鼟".
Fly
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Drum Character Department] 　鼟; Kangxi Strokes: 25; Page Number: Page 1527 Page 09
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? He went on cutting, the sound was stunned. [Jade articles] Drums.　[Jiyun] All Tengqie, Yindeng. It's not Dengqie again, Yin Teng. Righteous? Same.
Fly
